thread.title: Kelly Morris
thread.title_full: Rapid Formations reviewed by Kelly Morris

author: Kelly Morris
title: Kelly Morris
text:
Registering a company was simple. All the options were presented and there was no hard sell, just select the options you wanted, enter the details and it's done.
The response via email was quick (next day) and the email communication also carries on in a no nonsense fashion.
Sure you can do all the company registration yourself if you have the time, instead let rapid formations do it all for you, with a check that it is all submitted correctly.
